values.description: A Naked Put, also known as an uncovered put, involves the sale of put Options without having a corresponding short position in the underlying security.
values.keywords: naked put, profit from the Option premium, Strategy Payoff, risk of early assignment, option strategy
values.og:description: A Naked Put, also known as an uncovered put, involves the sale of put Options without having a corresponding short position in the underlying security.
values.og:title: Naked Put - Documentation QuantConnect.com
